Desc.entry: A community language school offering Chinese languages for Chinese people and the general public. Runs extra-curricular activities with a Chinese cultural theme including chess, folk dancing, lion dance, a mandarin class and calligraphy. Holds Chinese New Year celebrations in February and arranges a school outing in summer. An Annual General Meeting is held every year.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sun 11.30am-1.30pm (Mandarin classes), 2-4pm (Cantonese classes), school term-time only
